member.name: M:Google.GData.Apps.AppsService.SetRequestFactory(Google.GData.Client.IGDataRequestFactory)
member.summary:
the appsservice is an application object holding several real services object. To allow the setting of advanced http properties, proxies and other things, we allow setting the factory class that is used.
a getter does not make a lot of sense here, as which of the several factories in use are we getting? It also would give the illusion that you could get one object and then modify it's settings.
member.param: The factory to use for the AppsService

member.name: T:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException
member.summary: The AppsException class defines an error resulting from a Google Apps provisioning request.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.UnknownError
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the request failed for an unknown reason.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.UserDeletedRecently
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the request instructs Google to create a new user but uses the username of an account that was deleted in the previous five days.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.UserSuspended
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the user identified in the request is suspended.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.DomainUserLimitExceeded
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the specified domain has already reached its quota of user accounts.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.DomainAliasLimitExceeded
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the specified domain has already reached its quota of aliases. Aliases include nicknames and email lists.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.DomainSuspended
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that Google has suspended the specified domain's access to Google Apps.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.DomainFeatureUnavailable
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that a particular feature is not available for the domain.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.EntityExists
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the request instructs Google to create an entity that already exists.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.EntityDoesNotExist
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the request asks Google to retrieve an entity that does not exist.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.EntityNameIsReserved
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the request instructs Google to create an entity with a reserved name, such as "abuse" or "postmaster".

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.EntityNameNotValid
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the request provides an invalid name for a requested resource.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.InvalidGivenName
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the value in the API request for the user's first name, or given name, contains unaccepted characters.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.InvalidFamilyName
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the value in the API request for the user's surname, or family name, contains unaccepted characters.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.InvalidPassword
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the value in the API request for the user's password contains an invalid number of characters or unaccepted characters.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.InvalidUsername
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the value in the API request for the user's username contains unaccepted characters.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.InvalidHashFunctionName
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the specified password hash function name is not supported.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.InvalidHashDigestLength
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the password specified does not comply with the hash function specified.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.InvalidEmailAddress
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the email address specified is not valid.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.InvalidQueryParameterValue
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the query parameter value specified is not valid.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.TooManyRecipientsOnEmailList
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the request instructs Google to add users to an email list, but that list has already reached the maximum number of subscribers.

member.name: M:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new AppsException with no properties set.

member.summary: Accessor for InvalidInput. This property contains the data that caused an API response to fail; it may not be provided for all error types.

member.summary: Accessor for Reason. This property contains a short explanation of the error that occurred.
